# Objective
Analyze MTT assay results for 13cRA-treated neuroblastoma cell lines. 

# Set-up
```{r load packages}
library(tidyverse)
library(rstudioapi)
library(here)
library(styler)
library(lintr)
```

# Generate data frames
```{r define column vectors}
cell_lines <- c("IMR5", "SY5Y", "SKNAS", "SHEP")
molarity <- c(1, 5, 10)

```

```{r data frame}
df_list <- list()

for (i in cell_lines) {
  df <- data.frame(
    cell_line = i,
    molarity = molarity
  )
  
  df_list[[i]] <- df
}
```

# End of script

script <- rstudioapi::getSourceEditorContext()$path
